title: Game does not launch after champion select
body:
Riot,
Please help us. I do not know if you guys are working, or not. At least reply to us so we know
you guys are doing something.

Anyways,
I open up league for a game, go into queue, perfectly normal.
When championselect ends, the game does not load up...

Theres no League of Legends logo that comes up, nothing.
When i try to reconnect, i click the button. Then it minimizes the screen.
I open up the screen again. it says "please reconnect to the game". 

Please help...

replies.body:
Does your screen go black at any point? Could be [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/zgUdmTen-firewall-errorblack-screen-after-champion-select). It's only a temporary issue, though. If you don't feel like using the hotfix then you can probably just wait it out.

Otherwise, I would try the **Repair** tool in the patcher and test it out in a custom game. Could be the files just got corrupted.
Doesn't even come up at all..

Well, it couldn't hurt to try flushing your dns, and making sure that your internet settings are all there and proper.

What have you done so far about this issue? What OS are you using?
